header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements

and when people come to you and say well can you give me a hand with this? Can you look at these budgets? Can you tell me this information? You do sort of feel like cor this is quite a good job that I do like
it's quite rewarding actually and I feel like the last job I did was so boring really I see the girl who's taken over from me and she said that she wants to scratch her eyes out

I feel quite I feel quite sorry for her cos there's just her and her boss and her boss is in meetings nine till five like she has a ridiculous schedule like she's super super busy and so she never really sees her and you don't really feel like part of a team
you know processing invoices mm boobedy boo

actually was saying today um she went to a HoD meeting always we've been having this you know I've told you it love to say that they're looking after their staff and we're all actively working together to go for gold and aim higher and it's all shit cos they never actually do anything
and they've been saying that to me since we got I got that job you know that it's like a school and it's just an absolute piss-take that everyone just sits back here and just accepts what's going on
even though everyone knows it's absolute bullcrap

like it's mental and was initially she was you know she really threw herself into this job and she was like oh no no it's not rah rah rah slowly she's been like holy crap yeah and since her break-down before Christmas
she they have this thing so basically your time your manager to say this is actually what I really think
this is what's pissing me off this is what I like
um and you know like mine and Eve's and Eve's and Simon's and then all of ours together went really well
you know I think we've got to the point with each other now especially after just before Christmas that we'll just be completely honest with each other
completely honest eve went to hers and said all the HoDs there should be thirteen head of departments only four turned up
and one was HR and one was the er G GM so it was

maybe it was six including them um and one of them what they had to do was they had to make sure that we were all being honest with each other that was a big thing we are all honest with each other it's the least honest place you've ever seen in your life
in your life like the MD'll say things to us and then his head office say something that's a bit wrong he won't defend us
and we have to suck it up like we're getting audited right part of our bonus is dependent on these audit calls

that it's quite easy to spend that money in meetings
and it turns out we're getting tested on it if we get it wrong you'll lose your bonus if you if you ge if you forget to ask it have to ask
did they tell you that your bonus is at risk?
